text: E'ina hu'negu Ra Anumzana Anumzamo'a huno, Tamagri tavaonte'ma manigagi'naza kumapi vahera zamagatereta keontahi vahe mani'neta kasegeni'ne tra ke'ninena novaririze. Mago'a kumatmima tamagri tavaonte'ma megagi'nea kumapi vahe'mo'za tra kezamia avaririza knare hu'nazanagi zamagri knara tamagra osu'naze.
